content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":105397,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/44fa5f7d-af3f-4b45-bea7-b4d5794a3d2a/pic 5 (3).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/44fa5f7d-af3f-4b45-bea7-b4d5794a3d2a/pic 5 (3).png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"pic 5 (3).png\",\"name\":\"pic 5 (3).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"44fa5f7d-af3f-4b45-bea7-b4d5794a3d2a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":462,\"height\":420.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can open your personal account in any Polish bank. There is no commission for transfers between banks.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For more details, have a look on the Internet sites of the banks (addresses, opening hours, conditions, etc).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal presence is a must, passport and working contract are required (as a rule). Number of bank account to be provided to the employer up to 3 business days by the end of the month at the latest. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More info:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRGM/First+Steps+in+Poland#FirstStepsinPoland-OPENINGBANKACCOUNT\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRGM/First+Steps+in+Poland#FirstStepsinPoland-OPENINGBANKACCOUNT\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HERE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
